flawed_nl_solution:
Each dress takes 4 square meters of fabric to make, so the number of dresses she can make will be 56/4 = <<56/4=14.0>>14.0 dresses.
Each dress takes 3 hours to make, thus she will have to work 14.0 dresses x 3 hours/dress = <<14.0*3=24.0>>24.0 hours.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42.0, not 24.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
